item.title: Install Docker
item.description: From here Install and test sudo apt remove docker docker.io containerd runc sudo apt remove docker* sudo apt update sudo apt install -y ca-certificates curl gnupg lsb-release sudo mkdir -p /etc/apt/keyrings curl -fsSL https://download.

item.title: Common Docker Commands
item.description: General Commands docker images docker pull docker create docker ps docker attach 3378689f2069 Deleting, cleanup docker run â€”rm image_name docker system prune docker container prune Ubuntu Image docker pull ubuntu docker run -it ubuntu /bin/bash apt-get update Anaconda Image docker pull continuumio/anaconda3 docker run -it continuumio/anaconda3 /bin/bash Set up gui: https://dev.
